description: Want an updated, move-in-ready townhome? This is the one! Steps from McLean Park & Hamilton Elem, close to Queensborough Landing, Walmart, Costco & quick access to Hwy 91 & Westminster Hwy. 3 levels, almost 1,550 sqft, 4 beds, 3 baths & a layout that actually works for a family. Here’s the part buyers love: Big exterior updates are already taken care of. New roof, balcony, gutters, & skylights. Inside, you’ll see updated laminate in the living & dining, quartz counters in the kitchen & washrooms, & new kitchen appliances. When the sun’s out, you’ll actually use the outdoor space - A large, sunny SE-facing private patio plus a balcony. 2-car side-by-side garage with heavy-duty custom-built spacious cabinets. Plus there’s a clubhouse in the complex for family gatherings & celebrations!
